intro_page_video_not_supported: Your browser does not support video playback.
intro_page_features_desc: Experience a weekend full of spiritual inspiration and joy among young people who share a love for God.
intro_page_features_speach_small_desc: Which can inspire and enrich our spiritual lives.
intro_page_features_speech_modal_text: For more information, follow our social media!
intro_page_features_worship_text: Worship is an essential part of the event and will help us draw closer to God's presence.
intro_page_features_chapel_text: If you seek peace and a place to talk to God, visit the Mírák Chapel.
intro_page_features_bar_text: For an evening chat over good food or a snack after lunch, visit the Mírák Bar.
intro_page_features_workshops_text: A variety of interesting and enriching workshops await you—just pick one.
intro_page_features_merche_text: Get a piece of the event as a souvenir – our merch is here just for you!
intro_page_info_text: Our goal is to introduce God in an understandable way and motivate an active life with Him. We build a friendly and supportive community where everyone feels part of something bigger. We continuously improve the quality of our program and organization to provide participants with the best possible experience. Our events are open to all denominations, supporting spiritual growth and shared experience. We strive for innovation and new formats to meet the needs of modern people while fostering friendship, understanding, and respect among people of different religious and cultural traditions.
intro_page_place_desc: Save the location to arrive without issues! Parking will be available in front of the auditorium. If you're arriving by public transport, get off at the Hlavní třída stop.
intro_page_place_address_name: Auditorium of the VSB - Technical University of Ostrava
intro_page_pricing_only_all_info: Attend all parts of the program
intro_page_pricing_only_allmeal_info: Attend all parts of the program
intro_page_volunteer_description: If you'd like to help organize this year's event, don't hesitate to fill out a short form using the link below. You'll also find out what being a volunteer involves. We'll get in touch with you soon. We really appreciate any help!
intro_page_soc_network_description: Follow us on social media so you don't miss anything!
intro_page_soc_faq_desc: The most common questions and answers in one place – everything you need to know quickly and clearly.
intro_page_soc_faq_1_title: In what form should I bring the ticket to the event?
intro_page_soc_faq_1_desc: In any form you want. Whether digitally on a smart device or printed on paper. Just make sure the QR code is visible.
intro_page_soc_faq_2_title: Why can't I scan the QR code for payment after registering the ticket?
intro_page_soc_faq_2_desc: It's okay! The QR code on the ticket is not for payment. It's just an identification number for the participant. Payment for the ticket can only be made in cash on-site during registration.
intro_page_soc_faq_3_title: Can I pay by card at the event?
intro_page_live_description: Watch the ongoing live broadcast and don't miss anything!
error_page_description: An error occurred while loading the requested page.
intro_page_pricing_description: Want to attend? Choose a package and register for your ticket. If you do it online, you won’t have to deal with anything on-site!

ticket_register_no_pii_text: We are using subsidies for this event, which allow us to reduce its price. However, the subsidy is conditional on providing personal information. If you choose not to provide this information, we are unable to use the subsidy, and you will need to pay the difference as an additional charge.

accommodation_tictet_text:
Accommodation will be provided by the local CASD congregation. You will receive more information about accommodation via email! 

The price for one night is:
check_want_be_notified: I want to be notified about news and events
ticket_invalid_text_address: Address is required. It may contain only letters, numbers, spaces, slashes, dashes, and commas.
ticket_invalid_text_first_name: First name is required. It may contain only letters and spaces.
ticket_invalid_text_last_name: Last name is required. It may contain only letters and spaces.
ticket_btn_submit_not_all_filled: All required fields must be filled.
ticket_intro_text_with_food:
This ticket allows you to participate in all parts of the program, including lunch. When registering, please indicate which parts of the program you plan to attend. This will help us better organize the program and estimate the number of participants for each part. 

Make sure to fill out all required fields marked with an asterisk (*).

After successful registration, you will be automatically redirected to your ticket. Save it, as you will need it upon arrival at the event – present it at registration and then pay the fee in cash (card payments are not possible). The ticket will also be sent to you by email. Upon arrival at the event, don't forget to go through registration, which will be visibly marked.

We look forward to seeing you and wish you a pleasant experience with the program!
ticket_intro_text_only_friday:
This ticket allows you to attend only the Friday program. When registering, it is necessary to fill out all fields marked with an asterisk (*).

After successful registration, you will be automatically redirected to your ticket. Save it, as you will need it upon arrival at the event – present it at registration and then pay the fee in cash (card payments are not possible). The ticket will also be sent to you by email.

Upon arrival at the event, don't forget to go through registration, which will be visibly marked.

We look forward to seeing you and wish you a pleasant experience with the Friday program!
ticket_intro_text_without_food:
This ticket allows you to participate in all parts of the program, except for lunch. When registering, please indicate which parts of the program you plan to attend. This will help us better organize the program and estimate the number of participants for each part.

Make sure to fill out all required fields marked with an asterisk (*).

After successful registration, you will be automatically redirected to your ticket. Save it, as you will need it upon arrival at the event – present it at registration and then pay the fee in cash (card payments are not possible). The ticket will also be sent to you by email.

Upon arrival at the event, don't forget to go through registration, which will be visibly marked.

We look forward to seeing you and wish you a pleasant experience with the program!
ticket_part_program_text: In this package, you can participate in all parts of the program. Please select those you plan to attend. This information helps organizers ensure smooth program flow.
ticket_part_program_red_text: You must attend at least one Saturday part!
ticket_lunch_text: This package also includes lunch. Choose from the following options. The photo is for illustration purposes only.
ticket_workshop_test: Are you planning to attend workshops? You can read about each workshop here and register for them. Registration is not mandatory, but without it, there may not be available space.
note_pay_only_by_cash: Payment is only possible in cash at the event!

participant_food_select_disabled: Meal cannot be changed as it has already been delivered.
participant_food_change_text: Here you can change the selected meal for the participant. But don't forget to check the availability of portions, because even after they are used up, the meal can still be changed. If it has already been delivered, the change is not possible.

register_text: To register, please first enter your email. We will send a verification code to this email.
volunteer_text:
Join the Mírák Crew and be part of something extraordinary!

Organizing Mírák is a big challenge every year, but thanks to the enthusiasm and help of volunteers, everything can run smoothly. Now it's your chance to lend a hand!

You can help in various areas – at registration, with technical support, at the bar, with cleaning, serving meals, or anywhere else help is needed. Every minute of your time counts – even 10 minutes will help us a lot!

If this challenge interests you, don't hesitate to fill out the short form below. After submitting it, a member of our team will contact you to finalize the details and answer any questions you may have.

It's important to mention that even as a volunteer, you must register for a ticket to the event. By filling out the form, you are only letting us know that you want to help. Also, don't forget to include your phone number – we will primarily use WhatsApp for communication. If you don't use this app, we will find another way to stay in touch.

We look forward to seeing you! Who knows, maybe this will lead to a long-term collaboration. The Mírák team welcomes you!
